entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
